slide.title: Tidy Output Buffering
slide.blurb: The function %ob_tidyhandler()% is available for use with PHP output buffering to automatically parse, clean and repair output based on the %tidy.default_config% directive.
Alternatively, you can set the %tidy.clean_output% php.ini directive to true to automatically clean output.
*BE WARNED: Tidy does _not_ check the content type of the output!*
